Test Name: Factor VII Deficiency (F7 Gene) Next-Generation Sequencing
Purpose: To detect genetic variants in the F7 gene for diagnosing Factor VII deficiency using next-generation sequencing.
Container: Standard genetic testing container (e.g., EDTA tube for blood or sterile container for tissue)
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, NGS library preparation kit, DNA sequencer (e.g., Illumina), thermal cycler, bioinformatics software
